name: 7x7 - Tap and match
description:
Tap, tap, tap, tap.......(134 taps later).......tap, tap, tap and...DONE!!

Tapping circles is the main goal of 7x7. Keep tapping them until you match the original shape. That's it!!!

The amazing art style and simple, yet addicting, gameplay makes 7x7 an enjoyable experience for everyone.
